content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Mining and Processing Complex at (-10, -59)
A large mining and processing facility consisting of:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (-10,-59), (-8,-59), and (-6,-59) mining iron ore
- Transport belt system connecting the drills
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5) for ore storage
- Burner inserters at (-6.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-56.5), (-4.5,-57.5) moving materials between components

###Copper Mining and Smelting at (-28, -61)
A copper processing setup with:
- Burner mining drill at (-28,-61)
- Stone furnace at (-27,-59)
- Burner inserter at (-25.5,-58.5)
- Storage chest at (-24.5,-58.5) containing processed plates

###Iron Plate Production Line (0,0)
A smelting array consisting of:
- 4 stone furnaces at positions (0,0), (2,0), (4,0), (6,0)
- Input wooden chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output wooden chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Burner inserters moving materials between chests and furnaces
- Connected by transport belt systems

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied spaces
- Check if the target position is already occupied by another entity or item on ground before placing new entities
- When placing chests near mining drills, ensure the drop position is clear of other entities

### Output blocking errors
- Ensure there is a proper output entity (chest/belt) placed at the drop position of mining drills and inserters
- Clear any items blocking the output path before attempting to place new structures

### Entity placement coordination
- When building complex structures, plan the layout to avoid entity overlap
- Place output collection entities (chests/belts) before starting resource extraction
